Title: Relates to eliminating the default proceed firearm loophole
Summary: Relates to eliminating the default proceed firearm loophole by requiring a "proceed" response from the National Instant Criminal Background Check System before a licensee delivers a firearm to any person.
LawCode: Amd §400.00, Pen L; amd §§897 & 898, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the general business law, in relation to eliminating the default proceed firearm loophole
